title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, model manager, RAG, voice) that talks to local Ollama server.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI wrapper around ollama-js with REPL and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant for RAG.

title: ollama-tool-caller
summary: Official example showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Ollama’s internal gRPC protocol definitions and Go client example for low-latency inference.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI/CD) module that spins up Ollama service containers for pipeline testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama chat completions into any channel.
